General.Name: AidCoin
General.Description:
AidCoin is the ERC20 token that aims to become the preferred method to donate transparently through the Ethereum blockchain. The AID token will power AIDChain, a platform that provides an ecosystem of services through an easy-to-use interface, connecting the non-profit community while allowing full transparency and traceability of donations.

AIDChain’s services include an internal exchange to convert major cryptocurrencies into AidCoin, a built-in wallet to store and donate easily, an explorer to track donations transparently, tools to connect donors with all the actors involved in the non-profit sector and templates of smart contracts to run fundraising campaigns.

ICO.Description:
AidCoin is the ERC20 token that aims to become the preferred method to donate transparently through the Ethereum blockchain. The AID token will power AIDChain, a platform that provides an ecosystem of services through an easy-to-use interface, connecting the non-profit community while allowing full transparency and traceability of donations.

AIDChain’s services include an internal exchange to convert major cryptocurrencies into AidCoin, a built-in wallet to store and donate easily, an explorer to track donations transparently, tools to connect donors with all the actors involved in the non-profit sector and templates of smart contracts to run fundraising campaigns.

Team:

  • Francesco Nazari Fusetti: CEO and Founder. 
  • Manuela Ravalli: Business Development Manager and Co-founder. 
  • Vittorio Minacori: CTO and Blockchain Developer. 
  • Alexandra Ducocq: COO and US Managing Director 
  • Domenico Gravagno:Co-founder. 
  • Robert Robinson: UK Managing Director. 

AidCoin will be holding its ICO on January 16th, 2018. The ICO token supply represents 30% of the total token supply, so there will be a total of 30,000,000 tokens available, for a price of 0.0005 ETH each at the offering. The ICO funding target is 10,000 ETH. The funding cap is 14,333 ETH and the ICO is expected to end on February 1st, 2018 or when the funding cap is reached.

Token Reserve Split (60%):

  • 10% Team;
  • 10% AidPool
  • 3% Bounty Program
  • 10% Advisors & early backers
  • 27% AidCoin Company
